text: The Independence Day of Bangladesh is a national holiday. It commemorates the country's declaration of independence from United Kingdom. It is celebrated on 14 August 1947.Bangladesh Independence Day 14 August 1947 Independence Day is commonly associated with parades, political speeches, fairs, concerts, and ceremonies to celebrate the history and traditions of Bangladesh. The Independence Day Award is the highest state award given by the Government of Bangladesh. ==References== Category:Bangladeshi culture Bangladesh Category:March observances
title: Independence Day of Bangladesh
